Description: Get the MIME type of the data that this kit represents support for.

Method: read(InputStream in, Document doc, int pos)
Description: Insert content from the given stream which is expected to be in a format appropriate for this kind of content handler.

Method: read(Reader in, Document doc, int pos)
Description: Insert content from the given stream, which will be treated as plain text.

Method: write(OutputStream out, Document doc, int pos, int len)
Description: Write content from a document to the given stream in a format appropriate for this kind of content handler.

Method: write(Writer out, Document doc, int pos, int len)
Description: Write content from a document to the given stream as plain text.
